CSSText-decoration-line.summary: The text-decoration-line CSS property sets the kind of decoration that is used on text in an element, such as an underline or overline.

remarks.para: When setting multiple line-decoration properties at once, it may be more convenient to use the text-decoration shorthand property instead.
